header.heroTitle: Subscription to Eric REIT Investment Fund Starts

about.description: The diversified Eric REIT investment fund is a closed real estate investment fund publicly traded on the main market. It complies with Islamic Sharia principles and was established in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia under the regulations of real estate investment funds. The fund's portfolio consists of seven income-generating properties diversified by sector and location. The fund aims to achieve periodic rental income and distribute at least 90% of the net profits semi-annually.
about.subtitle: Total Fund Size
about.title: SAR 1,210,000,000
about.prfitRules: The fund aims to distribute profits semi-annually
